mapper.insert: insert into homegym values( #{hg_mem_id}, #{hg_nickname}, #{hg_person_count}, #{hg_price}, #{hg_info}, '1', #{hg_faddr}, #{hg_saddr}, #{hg_station}, #{hg_comeinfo}, to_date(#{hg_start_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{hg_end_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{hg_not_date}, #{hg_start_time}, #{hg_end_time}, sysdate, sysdate, '1')
mapper.select: select hg_nickname from homegym where hg_nickname = #{hg_nickname}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, f.*, a.hg_eq from (select h.hg_mem_id, wm_concat(eq_name) as hg_eq from homegym h,homegym_equipment e where h.hg_mem_id = e.eq_mem_id group by h.hg_mem_id) a, homegym f where a.hg_mem_id = f.hg_mem_id and
f.hg_faddr like '%${location}%' and
f.hg_start_date <= '${choice_date_d}' and f.hg_end_date >= '${choice_date_d}' and
f.hg_price >= #{price} and f.hg_person_count >= #{person_count} and f.hg_approved_check = '1' and f.hg_status = '1') b where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select * from homegym_equipment where eq_mem_id = #{value} order by eq_name
select * from member_file where mfile_key = '홈짐' and mfile_mem_id = #{value}
select * from star_review where rev_key = '회원이홈짐' and rev_target_id = #{value} order by rev_writedate
select count(*) from homegym where hg_mem_id = #{value}
